item.title: H41p m3! plz?!
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Sorry about the name, i felt it was necessary Anywho, i need help with loading a clan property, and if it doesnt exist, to write one. such as if the player.cfg file does not contain clan=null, then to write it. I’ve compiled this code with no errors, however it deletes the entire player.cfg :S [code=java]
FileOutputStream fs = new FileOutputStream(f);
DataOutputStream dos=new DataOutputStream(fs);

		try{
			setClan(props.getProperty("clan"));
		} catch(Exception e) {

			dos.writeChars("clan=null");

			setClan(props.getProperty("clan"));

				      }[/code]

Thanks for your time!

Read full topic
